attributes.action: abolish all parking charges and fines whatsoever / free parking everywhere
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Income tax, road tax, fuel tax and all other sorts of taxes should account for free use of the roads and should not have to pay on top of all these taxes for parking one own's car.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
